The rowsing of the sluggard, in 7. sermons Published at the request of diuers godlie and well affected. By W.B. Minister of the word of God at Reading in Barkeshire. Rowsing of the sluggard, in 7. sermons Burton, William, d. 1616.
[160] p.
Printed by the Widow Orwin for Thomas Man, At London : 1595.
W.B. = William Burton. Many pages misnumbered; pagination derived from signature collation. Signatures: [A]¹ B-L (-L8, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

[160] p.
Printed by the Widow Orwin for Thomas Man, At London : 1595.
W.B. = William Burton. Many pages misnumbered; pagination derived from signature collation. Signatures: [A]¹ B-L (-L8, blank?). Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
